name: marlatte-battleship
description: A classic board game built with TDD.

scripts.init-all: npm run init-webpack && npm run init-lint && npm run init-babel && npm run init-jest
scripts.init-jest: npm install jest babel-jest --save-dev && echo '*.test.js' > .eslintignore && npm init jest@latest
scripts.init-webpack: npm install webpack webpack-cli css-loader css-minimizer-webpack-plugin html-webpack-plugin mini-css-extract-plugin style-loader --save-dev
scripts.gh-deploy: git push origin :gh-pages && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-deploy-init: git push origin && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages

author: Walker Marlatt
